member.name: T:Cake.Gitter.Chat.GitterChatProvider
member.summary: Contains GitterProvider Chat functionality.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Cake.Gitter.Chat.GitterChatProvider.PostMessage(System.String,Cake.Gitter.Chat.GitterChatMessageSettings)
member.summary: Post message to Gitter Room
member.param: Lets you override default settings like UserName, IconUrl or if it should ThrowOnFail

example.para: Post directly into a specified Gitter Room, using the RoomId and authorization Token.
Post to the Activity Feed within a Gitter Room using a custom Web Hook Url.
Post to the Activity Feed within a Gitter Room using a custom Web Hook Url, specifying that there has been an error.

member.name: T:Cake.Gitter.Chat.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: This namespace contain types for the Gitter Chat tool.

summary.para:
In order to use the commands for this addin, you will need to include the following in your build.cake file to download and reference from NuGet.org:
#addin Cake.Gitter
